mapper.sql: ID, CREATED_DATE_TIME, CREATED_USER_ID, CREATED_USER_NAME, DESCRIPTION, LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID, LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME, NAME, ORGANIZATION_ID, USER_ID, WINDOW_IP, WINDOW_NO
mapper.select: select window.ID, window.CREATED_DATE_TIME, window.CREATED_USER_ID, window.CREATED_USER_NAME, window.DESCRIPTION, window.LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, window.LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID, window.LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME, window.NAME, window.ORGANIZATION_ID, window.USER_ID, window.WINDOW_IP, window.WINDOW_NO, organization.NAME ORGANIZATION_NAME from WINDOW window left join ORGANIZATION organization on organization.ID=window.ORGANIZATION_ID where window.ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert: insert into WINDOW (ID, CREATED_DATE_TIME, CREATED_USER_ID, CREATED_USER_NAME, DESCRIPTION, LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID, LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME, NAME, ORGANIZATION_ID, USER_ID, WINDOW_IP, WINDOW_NO) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{windowIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{windowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update WINDOW
CREATED_DATE_TIME = #{createdDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_USER_ID = #{createdUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_USER_NAME = #{createdUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID = #{lastUpdateUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME = #{lastUpdateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WINDOW_IP = #{windowIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WINDOW_NO = #{windowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WINDOW set CREATED_DATE_TIME = #{createdDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_USER_ID = #{createdUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_USER_NAME = #{createdUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID = #{lastUpdateUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME = #{lastUpdateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WINDOW_IP = #{windowIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WINDOW_NO = #{windowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT window.ID, window.CREATED_DATE_TIME, window.CREATED_USER_ID, window.CREATED_USER_NAME, window.DESCRIPTION, window.LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, window.LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID, window.LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME, window.NAME, window.ORGANIZATION_ID, window.USER_ID, window.WINDOW_IP, window.WINDOW_NO, users.USERNAME AS USERS_NAME, organization.NAME AS ORGANIZATION_NAME FROM Window window LEFT JOIN USERS users ON users.ID = window.USER_ID LEFT JOIN ORGANIZATION organization ON organization.ID = window.ORGANIZATION_ID AND organization.AMPUTATED = 0
CONCAT(ORGANIZATION.PATH ,',') like '%'||#{path}||'%' and
ORDER BY window.LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME DESC

SELECT window.ID, window.CREATED_DATE_TIME, window.CREATED_USER_ID, window.CREATED_USER_NAME, window.DESCRIPTION, window.LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, window.LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID, window.LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME, window.NAME, window.ORGANIZATION_ID, window.USER_ID, window.WINDOW_IP, window.WINDOW_NO, users.USERNAME AS USERS_NAME, organization.NAME AS ORGANIZATION_NAME FROM Window window LEFT JOIN USERS users ON users.ID = window.USER_ID LEFT JOIN ORGANIZATION organization ON organization.ID = window.ORGANIZATION_ID AND organization.AMPUTATED = 0
window.NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%' and window.WINDOW_NO like '%'||#{windowNo}||'%'
ORDER BY window.LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME DESC
